heading: HB06190
0: AN ACT TO PLACE SAFETY NETS FOR FILIPINO RICE PRODUCERS BY IMPOSING TARIFFS IN LIEU OF QUANTITATIVE RESTRICTIONS ON RICE IMPORTS, DIRECTING TARIFF COLLECTIONS FROM RICE IMPORTS TO PROJECTS AND PROGRAMS THAT WOULD ENHANCE RICE PRODUCTIVITY AND INCREASE FARMERS' INCOMES
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA11203 enacted on 2019-02-14 Substituted by HB07735
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB06190
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO PLACE SAFETY NETS FOR FILIPINO RICE PRODUCERS BY IMPOSING TARIFFS IN LIEU OF QUANTITATIVE RESTRICTIONS ON RICE IMPORTS, DIRECTING TARIFF COLLECTIONS FROM RICE IMPORTS TO PROJECTS AND PROGRAMS THAT WOULD ENHANCE RICE PRODUCTIVITY AND INCREASE FARMERS' INCOMES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GERON, RICO B.
DATE FILED : 2017-08-14
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2018-02-27
      2. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2018-02-27
          -Substitute Bill to House Bills Numbered 4018, 4904, 5023, 5326, 5433, 5443 and 6190 was approved with amendment.
MOTHER BILL: HB07735
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2017-08-16
